channel.title: Where to find Whonix-Gateway ™-*.ova.asc?
channel.description:
I'm trying to verify the .ova (with this guide here: whonix [dot] org/wiki/VirtualBox/Verify_the_virtual_machine_images_using_the_command_line) but it's not clear to me where I find the .asc file (is the URL broken?). Can someone point me in the right direction?
Thanks!

item.title: Where to find Whonix-Gateway ™-*.ova.asc?
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi dginovker

Welcome to the Whonix community!

The Whonix.ova.asc can be found in the Download Table.

Whonix/XFCE can be found on this page (Hit expand on the right)

  • https://whonix.orgwiki/VirtualBox/XFCE. Click on OpenPGP signature.

The Whonix images are now unified so a single image contains Both Whonix-Workstation and Whonix-Gateway .

For example, the Whonix-XFCE-15.0.0.3.3.ova and Whonix-XFCE-15.0.0.3.3.ova.asc is all that needs to be downloaded and verified for XFCE .

Read full topic
